line: [Intro]
Flatline
[Verse 1]
Lately
Why did you go against me? I just wanna know
How come you act so different? Talk to me
All the love I'm giving
sentence_boundary_exists_after_this_line: don't act like you don't know

line: [Pre-Chorus]
I was out there on the road
She became a victim to my busy schedule
And I know that it's not fair
sentence_boundary_exists_after_this_line: that don't mean that I don't care

line: This one's dedicated to the girl out there
[Chorus]
Girl
sentence_boundary_exists_after_this_line: you always catch me at the bad time (Bad time)

line: When I know you probably think it's a lie (A lie)
I know I told you last time was the last time (Last time)
How could you pull the plug and leave me flatline? (Flatline)
Flatline (Flatline)
How could you pull the plug and leave me flatline? (Oh-oh)
'Cause when I hit you
How could you pull the plug and leave me flatline?
[Verse 2]
Hard breathing
